message.text: You will be placing beacons. Go to the supply station that is marked with a red square on the map. Once there grab a batch of beacons. Then go to the position that is marked with a blue circle on the map with the same number as the first beacon.
Please place the beacon at about 10 ft of height on the wall. Repeat this for each other beacon. Once done with this batch write “Done”.

elements.title: Map
elements.subtitle: Here you can see your deployment map.
